reasoning.problem: Propose a bill to allocate $0.02 of the remaining cash reserves to conduct a proof-of-concept integration of Wolfram Alpha's capabilities into the existing trading strategies. The integration will focus on utilizing Wolfram Alpha to enhance alpha generation, improve risk modeling, and automate API generation for market data analysis. Success will be measured by demonstrable improvements in trading performance metrics (e.g., Sharpe ratio, alpha).
